citations.narrative:
Although the dogs at the facility were being provided with opportunities to exercise, the research facility could not locate
the Dog Exercise Plan at the time of the inspection. An exercise plan approved by the Attending Veterinarian, including
written standard procedures to be followed in providing the opportunity to exercise, is required whenever dogs are
maintained by a facility. As a result, the dog exercise plan could not be reviewed during the inspection.
Per this Section. all documents that are required to be kept under the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) should be available at
the time of an inspection so the required documents can be reviewed to determine compliance with the provisions of the
AWA. Copies of all documents and records required under the AWA need to be on the premises and available for review.
Correct by 5/23/25.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
2.38(b)(1)(ii) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
Although the dogs at the facility were being provided with opportunities to exercise, the research facility could not locate 
the Dog Exercise Plan at the time of the inspection. An exercise plan approved by the Attending Veterinarian, including 
written standard procedures to be followed in providing the opportunity to exercise, is required whenever dogs are 
maintained by a facility. As a result, the dog exercise plan could not be reviewed during the inspection.  
 
Per this Section. all documents that are required to be kept under the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) should be available at 
the time of an inspection so the required documents can be reviewed to determine compliance with the provisions of the 
AWA. Copies of all documents and records required under the AWA need to be on the premises and available for review. 
Correct by 5/23/25. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.  
 
*END OF REPORT*
